definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="timeLeft">timeLeft</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:timeLeft</field><value name="VAL"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">DIVIDE</field><value name="A"><block type="procedure_retval_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="procedure">GetInvoiceTimer</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">java.text.DecimalFormat df = new java.text.DecimalFormat("00");&#10;&#10;df.setRoundingMode(java.math.RoundingMode.DOWN);</field><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">df.format(timeLeft/60) + ":" + df.format(timeLeft%60)</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
